scenario.say: Hello! Press my belly and talk to me.

scenario.say: Lets talk about the sounds that animals make. The cow says Moo. The pig says Oink Oink. The cat says Meow. The dog says Woof Woof. The rooster says cockle doodle doo.

scenario.say: Lets sing a song. Twinkle twinkle little star. How I wonder what you are.
Lets sing a song. London bridge is falling down, falling down, falling down
Lets sing a song. You are my sunshine, my only sunshine. You make me happy when skies are gray.
Lets sing a song. Humpty Dumpty sat on a wall, Humpty Dumpty had a great fall. All the kings horses and all the kings men. Couldnt put Humpty together again
Lets sing a song. Five little monkeys swinging in a tree, teasing Mister Alligator. You cant catch me. No, you cant catch me.
Lets sing a song. How much is that Teddy in the window? The one with the shaggy tail.
Lets sing a song. Home, Home on the range. Where the kids and Teddy bears play.
scenario.default_remark: Sorry, but I didnt understand you. Could you please rephrase and say that again?

scenario.say: Why is six afraid of seven? Because seven eight nine!
Why is six afraid of seven? Because seven eight nine!
What do you call a pig that knows karate? Pork chops!
Why do cows wear bells? Because their horns dont work!
What do you get when you plant a frog? A croak tree!
How does a dog stop a video? He presses the paws button!
What has one horn and gives milk? A milk truck!
Why did the cat run from the tree? Because it was afraid of the bark!
